charinfo.name: Gekko Hayate
charinfo.description: A Jounin and exam proctor from Konoha; while sickly and afflicted with a chronic cough, he is calm and composed. Hayate is an expert sword user, and is well acquainted with using stealth to increase the deadliness of his attacks.

abilities.name: Crescent Moon Slash
abilities.description: Hayate jumps on an enemy from above, dealing 15 damage to them. Hayate will deal 5 additional damage with his skills for the rest of the game.

abilities.name: Dance Of The Crescent Moon
abilities.description: Using both his sword and genjutsu together, Hayate will deal 30 damage to one enemy and the first harmful skill used against him on the following turn will be countered.

abilities.name: Meld Into Shadows
abilities.description: Hayate gains 25 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, he will gain 15 points of damage reduction. The turn after, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 3 turns, Hayate will deal 10 more damage with his skills.

abilities.name: Backflip Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.
